page.title: 09FARM SURVEY OUTLINE
page.content: All the farms recorded on the Ordinance Survey map of the area were sent a questionaire by the children. They were asked these questions. How big is the farm (acres/hectares)? How many pasture fields do you have? How many fields for crops other than grass? How many grass fields for hay/silage? What other crops are grown this year? How many of the following do you have; milking cows, beef cattle, breeding ewes, lambs for meat, pigs, chickens, geese? Are there any other animals? How many tractors are in use? What other machines do you have? How many people work full time and part time? (Full time means 40 hours a week) Is there anything else that you think we have missed out that you think is important?
